snippet: Rabbi Leib Glanz, who pleaded guilty in September to lying to the federal government in order to defraud it of thousands of dollars of Section 8 housing subsidies, was sentenced in Manhattan.
abstract: Justice P Kevin Castel of Federal District Court in Manhattan sentences Rabbi Leib Glanz of Brooklyn to 45 days in federal prison; Glanz pleaded guilty in 2011 to lying to the federal government in order to defraud it of thousands of dollars of Section 8 housing subsidies intended for the poor.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Leib Glanz, who pleaded guilty in September to lying to the federal government in order to defraud it of thousands of dollars of Section 8 housing subsidies, was sentenced in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Rabbi Who Served Community, and Stole From It, to Now Repay It
headline.main: Rabbi Who Served Prisoners Is Sentenced to Spend 45 Days as One
headline.print_headline: Rabbi Who Served Prisoners Is Sentenced to Spend 45 Days as One
